RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 250 Y Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOARACROSSYOURMIND brush break, driving. HEZA FAST TAC sound bump brk,willing. JRS MAJESTIC BAYOU not enough outside. SWEET MISS B sound bump brk,back. MERCI slight hop brk, empty. TM LA PATRIOT LADY off slow,brush,trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Merci

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: B THE VISION bid midway, best. BIG MAN slipped brk,duel,miss. ALYSSAS HERO early bid, faltered. JESS DASHING GRAND lacked kick rail. IM FAST N FAMOUS off step slow. MONTI POWER JAM ducked out brk,trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Purse 17500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 300 Y Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAST OF BLUE FLAME late push btwn foes. WENDELLS FAST DASH late bid, missed. MOLINO brk in, vied,outkicked. TF RIPPIN CANDY early bid, weakened. IMFLYINGBYYOU brush, improved bit. C THE POWER no factor outside. TDZ FIRST PRIZE DASH finished early. APONTE off step slow,trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 300 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR TRIAL OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAN LORENZO GIRL complete control. APOLLITICAL ANSWER chased, nod 2nd. RANCH WATR just missed 2nd. TTTGOLDEN CUP last away, rail trip. HEZA FAST BLOOD not enough late. NBC MR CHRIS lacked bid outside.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 220 Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 18500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JP LA VENADITA determined late. SASSY PINK CARTEL good try rail. LONESTAR RUNNER lacked needed punch. ONE FINE BEAST brk in,bump,improved. FIVE STAR CHICK little impact outside. PRS DIVAS N DIAMONDS bmp brk,late traffic. GOLDEN DOC fell back, no factor.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Opelousas S. - Grade3 EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 400 Y Dirt CR: 96. Stakes Purse 40000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED QUARTER HORSES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. No nomination or start fee. $400 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $800.00 accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $40,000 Guaranteed to be divided 60% to fir st, 20% to second, 11% to third, 6% to fourth 3% to fifth. WEIGHTS: Three Year Olds 124 lbs. Older 126 lbs. Preference to horse with the highest earnings in 2022-2023. The second part of same owners entries will have no consideration over a single intere st. Failure to draw into race will cancel all fees. Trophy to winning owner.(*A Negative Hair Test Is Required Before Entering).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONIN RUSTY brk out,drift,strongly. INTO THE GREY chased, no match. BEST MAGIC PILOTO brushed, last away. ONE FAST PERRY lacked response rail.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 300 Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS TA DASH A BLUE early bid, confident. BELLA CAN FLY brk in,chased,2nd best. JJ KICJESS PRINCESS late rally show. ONE FAST B brush break, evenly. JESSA BOSS tight early,improved. MR JOHN bump break, no bid. ROSE POOL mid pack, faded. TG COUP AZOOM forward, gave way.
